titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C17

body.ab: <milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.07" unit="tei:head"/><lb n="c57-0002__main__1"/> Vol. II <lb n="c57-0002__main__2"/> Chap I<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0002__main__3"/> "It is with difficulty that I remember <lb n="c57-0002__main__4"/> the æra of my <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e26__Start"/>cr<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e26__End"/> being. All the events of <lb n="c57-0002__main__5"/> that period appear confused & indistinct. <lb n="c57-0002__main__6"/><del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e32__Start"/>I know only that I felt a strange<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e32__End"/> A strange <lb n="c57-0002__main__7"/> sensation <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e40__Start"/>sea<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e40__End"/> seized me <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e43__Start"/>and a it appeared<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e43__End"/><lb n="c57-0002__main__8"/> I saw, felt heard and smelt at the same <lb n="c57-0002__main__9"/> time and it was indeed a long time be<lb n="c57-0002__main__10"/>fore I learned to distinguish between the <lb n="c57-0002__main__11"/><lb n="c57-0002__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c57-0002__left_margin__d1e62__Start"/>various <del loc="c57-0002__left_margin__d1e62__End"/><del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e65__Start"/>op<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e65__End"/>operations of my various senses. By degrees <lb n="c57-0002__main__12"/> I remember a stronger light pressed upon <lb n="c57-0002__main__13"/> my nerves <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e75__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e75__End"/> so that I was obliged to close <lb n="c57-0002__main__14"/> my eyes. Darkness then came over me <lb n="c57-0002__main__15"/> and troubled me.– But hardly had I felt <lb n="c57-0002__main__16"/> this when (by opening my eyes as I now suppose) <lb n="c57-0002__main__17"/> the light poured in upon me again– I walked <lb n="c57-0002__main__18"/> and I believe descended; but presently I found <lb n="c57-0002__main__19"/> a great <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e93__Start"/>difference<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e93__End"/>alteration in my sensations; before <lb n="c57-0002__main__20"/> dark opaque bodies had surrounded me,<lb n="c57-0002__main__21"/> impervious to my touch or sight – and I <lb n="c57-0002__main__22"/> now found that I could wander on at liberty <lb n="c57-0002__main__23"/> with no obstacles which I could not either <lb n="c57-0002__main__24"/> surmount or avoid– The light <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e114__Start"/>be<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e114__End"/> became <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>more&<lb n="c57-0002__main__25"/> more opressive to me and the heat wearying <lb n="c57-0002__main__26"/> me as I walked I sought a place where I could <lb n="c57-0002__main__27"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.04" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0002.02"/>perceive<milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.05" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0002.03"/>recieve shade. This was the forest near Ingolstadt,<lb n="c57-0002__main__28"/> and here by the side of a brook I lay <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e146__Start"/>weary<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e146__End"/><lb n="c57-0002__main__29"/> for some hours <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>resting from my fatigue untill I felt tormented by <lb n="c57-0002__main__30"/> hunger and thirst. This roused me from my nearly<lb n="c57-0003__main__1"/> dormant state and I ate some berries <lb n="c57-0003__main__2"/> which I found <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>hanging on the trees or lying on <lb n="c57-0003__main__3"/> the ground – I slaked my thirst by the <lb n="c57-0003__main__4"/> brook and then again lying down I was <lb n="c57-0003__main__5"/> overcome by sleep<mdel>–</mdel>; It was dark when I <lb n="c57-0003__main__6"/> awoke, I felt cold also and half frightened <lb n="c57-0003__main__7"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>as it were instinctively on <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e211__Start"/>seein<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e211__End"/> finding myself so desolate. <lb n="c57-0003__main__8"/> Before I had quitted your appartment <lb n="c57-0003__main__9"/> on a sensation of cold I had covered my <lb n="c57-0003__main__10"/> self with some clothes, but these were <lb n="c57-0003__main__11"/><del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e225__Start"/>not<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e225__End"/>insufficient to secure me from the <lb n="c57-0003__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e233__Start"/>dw<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e233__End"/> dews of night. I was a poor helpless <lb n="c57-0003__main__13"/> miserable wretch—I knew <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e238__Start"/>no<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e238__End"/>& could <lb n="c57-0003__main__14"/> distinguish <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e244__Start"/>no<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e244__End"/> nothing but <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e249__Start"/>felt<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e249__End"/><metamark>^</metamark>feeling pain <lb n="c57-0003__main__15"/> invade me on all sides <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e262__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e262__End"/> I sat down <lb n="c57-0003__main__16"/> and wept.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0003__main__17"/> Soon a gentle light stole over the <lb n="c57-0003__main__18"/> heavens and gave me a sensation of pleasure <lb n="c57-0003__main__19"/> I started up, and beheld a radiant form <lb n="c57-0003__main__20"/> rise <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e278__Start"/>am<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e278__End"/> from among the trees. I gazed with <lb n="c57-0003__main__21"/> a kind of wonder – It moved slowly; but <lb n="c57-0003__main__22"/> it enlightened my path, and I again <lb n="c57-0003__main__23"/> went out in search of berries. I was still <lb n="c57-0003__main__24"/> cold when <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e290__Start"/>on the ground<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e290__End"/> under one of the <lb n="c57-0003__main__25"/> trees I found a huge cloak with which I– <lb n="c57-0003__main__26"/> covered myself, and sat down on the ground. <lb n="c57-0003__main__27"/> No distinct ideas occupied my mind all was <lb n="c57-0003__main__28"/> confused <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e302__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e302__End"/> I felt the light, and hunger <lb n="c57-0003__main__29"/> and thirst and darkness; innumerable <lb n="c57-0003__main__30"/> sounds rung in my ears and on all sides <lb n="c57-0003__main__31"/> various scents saluted me; the only object <lb n="c57-0003__main__32"/> that I could distinguish was the bright<lb n="c57-0004__main__1"/> moon and I fixed my eyes <mdel>i</mdel>on <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e333__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e333__End"/> that with <lb n="c57-0004__main__2"/> pleasure. Several changes of day and night <lb n="c57-0004__main__3"/> passed and the orb of night had greatly <lb n="c57-0004__main__4"/> lessened when I began to distinguish my <lb n="c57-0004__main__5"/> sensations <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>from each other–. I <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e357__Start"/>first saw<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e357__End"/><del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e361__Start"/>dis<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e361__End"/> gradually saw plainly the clear stream <lb n="c57-0004__main__6"/> that supplied me with drink and the <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e369__Start"/>gre<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e369__End"/><lb n="c57-0004__main__7"/> trees that <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e377__Start"/>covered<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e377__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>shaded me with their foliage. <lb n="c57-0004__main__8"/> I was delighted when I first discovered <lb n="c57-0004__main__9"/> that a pleasant sound <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e394__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e394__End"/>which often <lb n="c57-0004__main__10"/><del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e403__Start"/>delighte<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e403__End"/> saluted my ears proceeded <lb n="c57-0004__main__11"/> from the throats of <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e408__Start"/>son<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e408__End"/> the little <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e413__Start"/>anih<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e413__End"/>winged<lb n="c57-0004__main__12"/>a<mdel>m</mdel>nimals who often intercepted the light<lb n="c57-0004__main__13"/> from my eyes. I began also to see <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e437__Start"/>an<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e437__End"/><lb n="c57-0004__main__14"/> with <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e442__Start"/>forms<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e442__End"/> greater accuracy the forms <lb n="c57-0004__main__15"/> that surrounded me and to perceive <lb n="c57-0004__main__16"/> the boundaries of the radiant light which <lb n="c57-0004__main__17"/><del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e451__Start"/>overspeaed my dwelling<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e451__End"/> canopied me.–some<lb n="c57-0004__main__18"/>times I tried to imitate the pleasant songs of <lb n="c57-0004__main__19"/> the birds but was unable— Sometimes I <lb n="c57-0004__main__20"/><del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e467__Start"/>also<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e467__End"/> wished to express my sensations in <lb n="c57-0004__main__21"/> my own mode but the uncouth and innarticu<lb n="c57-0004__main__22"/>late sound which broke from me <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e489__Start"/>which<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e489__End"/> frightened <lb n="c57-0004__main__23"/> me into silence again.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0004__main__24"/> The moon had dissapeared from the night, &<lb n="c57-0004__main__25"/> again with a lessened form it shewed itself <lb n="c57-0004__main__26"/><del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e502__Start"/>again<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e502__End"/> while I still remained in the forest. <lb n="c57-0004__main__27"/> My <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e509__Start"/>ideas<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e509__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sensations were by this time become distinct <lb n="c57-0004__main__28"/>&<mdel>e</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>my mind received every day aditional <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e538__Start"/>ones<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e538__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ideas. My eyes <lb n="c57-0004__main__29"/> became accustomed to the light and to <lb n="c57-0004__main__30"/> perceive objects in their right forms; I distin<lb n="c57-0005__main__1"/><lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__1"/>guished the<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e571__Start"/>insect<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e571__End"/> insect from the herb, and by de<lb n="c57-0005__main__2"/>grees one herb from <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e581__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e581__End"/> another – I found <lb n="c57-0005__main__3"/> that the sparrow uttered none but harsh <lb n="c57-0005__main__4"/> notes <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e590__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e590__End"/><del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e593__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e593__End"/>whilst<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e603__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e603__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>those of the blackbird were sweet <lb n="c57-0005__main__5"/> and enticing. <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e617__Start"/>I had le<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e617__End"/> one day when I was <lb n="c57-0005__main__6"/> oppressed by cold I found a fire that <lb n="c57-0005__main__7"/> had been left by some wandering beg<lb n="c57-0005__main__8"/>gars and was over come with delight<mdel>.</mdel><metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0005.02">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__2"/> at the warmth <lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__3"/> which I ex- <lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__4"/> perienced from <lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__5"/> it.<lb n="c57-0005__main__9"/> In my joy I thrust my hand into the <lb n="c57-0005__main__10"/> live embers but quickly drew it away with a cry<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e667__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e667__End"/><lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__1"/>of <lb n="c57-0005__main__11"/>pain– How strange, I thought, that the <lb n="c57-0005__main__12"/> same cause should at once produce <lb n="c57-0005__main__13"/> such <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e684__Start"/>delicious and such<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e684__End"/><del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e687__Start"/>u<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e687__End"/><del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e692__Start"/>opp<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e692__End"/> opposite <lb n="c57-0005__main__14"/> effects –I examined the materials of the <lb n="c57-0005__main__15"/> fire, & to my joy found it to be wood – <lb n="c57-0005__main__16"/> I quickly collected some branches but <lb n="c57-0005__main__17"/> they were wet and would not burn. <lb n="c57-0005__main__18"/> I was pained at this and sat still <lb n="c57-0005__main__19"/> watching the o<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e708__Start"/>p<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e708__End"/>peration of the fire. <lb n="c57-0005__main__20"/> The wet wood I had placed near the heat <lb n="c57-0005__main__21"/><del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e716__Start"/>became dy dry<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e716__End"/>dried, and itself <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e723__Start"/>became<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e723__End"/> became <lb n="c57-0005__main__22"/><del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e730__Start"/>hot<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e730__End"/><lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__1"/>inflamed. I reflected on this, and by touching <lb n="c57-0005__main__23"/> the various branches I discovered the cause <lb n="c57-0005__main__24"/> and busied myself in collecti<mdel>on</mdel>ng a great <lb n="c57-0005__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e757__Start"/>deal<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e757__End"/>quantity of wood that I might dry it and <lb n="c57-0005__main__26"/> have a <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e767__Start"/>pel<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e767__End"/> plentiful supply oof fire. When night <lb n="c57-0005__main__27"/> came on and <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>brought with it sleep, I was in the greatest <lb n="c57-0005__main__28"/> fear lest my fire should be extinguished <lb n="c57-0005__main__29"/> I covered it carefully with <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e793__Start"/>try<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e793__End"/> dry wood <lb n="c57-0005__main__30"/> and leaves & then placed upon that wet <lb n="c57-0005__main__31"/> branches and then spreading my cloak I <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e800__Start"/>la<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e800__End"/><lb n="c57-0006__main__1"/> on the ground <mdel>I</mdel>& sunk into sleep. I was morning <lb n="c57-0006__main__2"/> when I It was morning when I awoke & my <lb n="c57-0006__main__3"/> first care was to visit the fire –I uncovered <lb n="c57-0006__main__4"/> it and <del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e829__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e829__End"/> a gentle breeze quickly fanned it <lb n="c57-0006__main__5"/> into a flame I observed this also and contri<lb n="c57-0006__main__6"/>ved a fan of branches which roused the <lb n="c57-0006__main__7"/> embers when thy were nearly extinguished. <lb n="c57-0006__main__8"/> When night again came I found with plea<lb n="c57-0006__main__9"/>sure that the fire gave light as well <lb n="c57-0006__main__10"/> as heat <del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e854__Start"/>and I often<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e854__End"/> and the discovery of this <lb n="c57-0006__main__11"/> element was useful to me also in my food– <lb n="c57-0006__main__12"/> for I found some of offals that the travel<lb n="c57-0006__main__13"/>lers had left had been roasted and tasted <lb n="c57-0006__main__14"/> much more savoury than the berries <lb n="c57-0006__main__15"/> I gathered; I tried therefore to dress my food <lb n="c57-0006__main__16"/> in the same manner, placing them <lb n="c57-0006__main__17"/> on the live embers– I found that the <lb n="c57-0006__main__18"/> berries were spoiled by this o<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e879__Start"/>p<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e879__End"/>peration <lb n="c57-0006__main__19"/> and the nuts much improved. Food <lb n="c57-0006__main__20"/> however became very scarce and I often <lb n="c57-0006__main__21"/> spent a day searching in vain for a <lb n="c57-0006__main__22"/> few acorns to assuage the pangs of hunger. <lb n="c57-0006__main__23"/> When I found this resolved to quit the place <lb n="c57-0006__main__24"/> which I had hitherto inhabited & to seek for <lb n="c57-0006__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e898__Start"/>a place<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e898__End"/>one where the few wants I expe<lb n="c57-0006__main__26"/>rienced would be more easily satisfied. <lb n="c57-0006__main__27"/> In this emigration I <del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e916__Start"/>extremely<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e916__End"/>exceedingly lamented the <lb n="c57-0006__main__28"/> loss of my fire–I had obtained it <del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e925__Start"/>by<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e925__End"/> by strange <lb n="c57-0006__main__29"/> means and knew not how to reproduce it. <del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e936__Start"/>by myself<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e936__End"/><lb n="c57-0006__main__30"/><del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e942__Start"/>This<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e942__End"/><lb n="c57-0006__left_margin__1"/>this deficiency obtained my serious consideration for <lb n="c57-0006__main__31"/> several hours but I was obliged to <del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e955__Start"/>leave it<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e955__End"/><lb n="c57-0007__main__1"/><lb n="c57-0007__left_margin__1"/> relinquish all <lb n="c57-0007__left_margin__2"/> attempts to <lb n="c57-0007__left_margin__3"/> supply it, and wrapp<mdel>r</mdel>ing myself up in my cloak <lb n="c57-0007__main__2"/> I struck across the wood towards the <lb n="c57-0007__main__3"/> setting sun – I passed three days in these <lb n="c57-0007__main__4"/> rambles and at length discovered the <lb n="c57-0007__main__5"/> open country – A great fall of snow had <lb n="c57-0007__main__6"/> taken place the night before and the <lb n="c57-0007__main__7"/> fields were of one uni<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e998__Start"/>n<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e998__End"/>form white the <lb n="c57-0007__main__8"/> appearrance was disconsolate and I <lb n="c57-0007__main__9"/> found my feet chilled by the cold <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1006__Start"/>dab<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1006__End"/><lb n="c57-0007__main__10"/> damp <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>substance that covered the ground – It was about seven in <lb n="c57-0007__main__11"/> the morning and I longed to obtain food <lb n="c57-0007__main__12"/> and shelter. At length I perceived <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1026__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1026__End"/> a <lb n="c57-0007__main__13"/> small hut which had <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1031__Start"/>b<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1031__End"/> doubtless been <lb n="c57-0007__main__14"/> built for the convenience of <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1037__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1037__End"/><lb n="c57-0007__main__15"/> some shepheard. This was a new sight <lb n="c57-0007__main__16"/> to me and I examined the <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1048__Start"/>stu<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1048__End"/>struc<lb n="c57-0007__main__17"/>ture of it with great curiosity. <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1058__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1058__End"/><lb n="c57-0007__main__18"/> finding the door open I entered. An old <lb n="c57-0007__main__19"/> man sat <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1065__Start"/>it<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1065__End"/> in it, near a fire <mdel>on</mdel>over<mdel>by</mdel><lb n="c57-0007__main__20"/> which he was preparing his breakfast <lb n="c57-0007__main__21"/> he turned <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1086__Start"/>of<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1086__End"/> on hearing a noise <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1089__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1089__End"/><del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1092__Start"/>on<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1092__End"/><lb n="c57-0007__main__22"/><lb n="c57-0007__left_margin__1"/>and perceiving me shrieked loudly and quiting <lb n="c57-0007__main__23"/> the hut ran across the fields with <lb n="c57-0007__main__24"/> a speed <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1111__Start"/>little<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1111__End"/> of which his debilitated form <lb n="c57-0007__main__25"/> hardly appeared capable.<mdel>of</mdel> His flight <lb n="c57-0007__main__26"/> somewhat surprised me – but I was <lb n="c57-0007__main__27"/> inchanted with the appearance of the <lb n="c57-0007__main__28"/> hut. Here the snow and rain could not <lb n="c57-0007__main__29"/> penetrate – the ground was dry and wind <lb n="c57-0007__main__30"/> expelled and it <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1143__Start"/>appeared<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1143__End"/>presented to me then <lb n="c57-0007__main__31"/> as <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1152__Start"/>heavenly and divine<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1152__End"/> exquisite &di<lb n="c57-0008__main__1"/>vine a retreat as Pandemonium appeared <lb n="c57-0008__main__2"/> to the <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1168__Start"/>tr<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1168__End"/> dominions of Hell<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1172__Start"/>.<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1172__End"/> after thier suffocation in the <lb n="c57-0008__left_margin__1"/> lake of <lb n="c57-0008__left_margin__2"/> fire. I greedily <lb n="c57-0008__main__3"/> devoured the rem<mdel>m</mdel>nants of the shepherds <lb n="c57-0008__main__4"/> breakfast which consisted of bread, cheese, <lb n="c57-0008__main__5"/> milk & rhenish wine; the latter of which <lb n="c57-0008__main__6"/> however I did not like. Then overcome <lb n="c57-0008__main__7"/> by fatigue I lay down among some straw <lb n="c57-0008__main__8"/>& fell asleep.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0008__main__9"/> It was noon when I awoke and allured <lb n="c57-0008__main__10"/> by the <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1217__Start"/>warth<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1217__End"/> warmth of the sun I deter<lb n="c57-0008__main__11"/>mined to recommence my travels–&<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1228__Start"/>wrapping<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1228__End"/><del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1231__Start"/>dep<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1231__End"/><lb n="c57-0008__left_margin__1"/>depositing<lb n="c57-0008__main__12"/> the <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1247__Start"/>rest<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1247__End"/>remains of the <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1254__Start"/>herds bre<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1254__End"/> peasants break<lb n="c57-0008__main__13"/>fast in a wallet I found, I proceeded <lb n="c57-0008__main__14"/> across the fields for several hours, untill <lb n="c57-0008__main__15"/> at sunset I <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1270__Start"/>came to<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1270__End"/>arrived at a village. How mira<lb n="c57-0008__main__16"/>culous did this appear. The huts the neater <lb n="c57-0008__main__17"/> cottages & stat<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>elier houses engaged my <lb n="c57-0008__main__18"/> admiration by turns– The vegetables in the <lb n="c57-0008__main__19"/> gardens<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1303__Start"/>allured me<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1303__End"/> and the milk and <lb n="c57-0008__main__20"/> cheese that I saw placed at <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1309__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1309__End"/> the windows <lb n="c57-0008__main__21"/> of some of the cottages<mdel>—</mdel>allured me— One of the best of <lb n="c57-0008__main__22"/> these I entered– but I had hardly placed <lb n="c57-0008__main__23"/> my foot <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1329__Start"/>inside<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1329__End"/>within the door before the <lb n="c57-0008__main__24"/> children shrieked and one of the child<lb n="c57-0008__main__25"/>ren women fainted, the village was roused <lb n="c57-0008__main__26"/> some fled,—some attacked me untill <lb n="c57-0008__main__27"/> grievously bruised by <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1354__Start"/>sticks<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1354__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>stones and <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1365__Start"/>all<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1365__End"/><lb n="c57-0008__main__28"/> many other kinds of missile weapon I<lb n="c57-0009__main__1"/> escaped to the open country and fear <lb n="c57-0009__main__2"/> fully took refuge in a low <del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1381__Start"/>hut<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1381__End"/>hovel –quite <lb n="c57-0009__main__3"/> bare and making a wretched appearance <lb n="c57-0009__main__4"/> after the pal<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1393__Start"/>l<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1393__End"/>aces I had beheld in the <lb n="c57-0009__main__5"/> village.– This <del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1400__Start"/>hut<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1400__End"/>hovel however adjoined a <lb n="c57-0009__main__6"/> cottage of a neat & pleasant appearance, <lb n="c57-0009__main__7"/> but after my late <metamark>^</metamark>dearly bought experience <lb n="c57-0009__main__8"/> I dared not enter it. My place of refuge<metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0009.04">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0009__main__9"/><del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1430__Start"/>was the tool house and had not been<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1430__End"/><lb n="c57-0009__main__10"/>was not used <del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1440__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1440__End"/> by the inhabitants of the ad<lb n="c57-0009__main__11"/>joining dwelling and was entirely shut <lb n="c57-0009__main__12"/> out from view by a pigstye on one <lb n="c57-0009__main__13"/> side and a dunghill & small <del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1454__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1454__End"/>pool <lb n="c57-0009__main__14"/> on <del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1459__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1459__End"/> another – the two others were <lb n="c57-0009__main__15"/> formed by the wall of the cottage. Here <lb n="c57-0009__main__16"/>then I retreated and lay down happy to have <lb n="c57-0009__main__17"/> found a shelter from the inclemency <lb n="c57-0009__main__18"/> of the season & still more from the <lb n="c57-0009__main__19"/> barbarity of man <lb n="c57-0009__main__20"/><metamark function="separate">___________________________</metamark><lb n="c57-0009__main__21"/> was constructed of wood, <mdel>&</mdel>but so low that <lb n="c57-0009__main__22"/> I could with difficulty sit upright in <lb n="c57-0009__main__23"/> it. <del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1503__Start"/>The<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1509__End"/> No wood however <lb n="c57-0009__main__24"/> was placed on the earth which formed <lb n="c57-0009__main__25"/> the floor of the cottage but it was dry <lb n="c57-0009__main__26"/> and although the wind entered by <lb n="c57-0009__main__27"/> innumerable chinks I found it an <lb n="c57-0009__main__28"/> agreable assylum from the snow <lb n="c57-0009__main__29"/>& rain<lb n="c57-0010__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0010.02" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 2<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0010__main__2"/> As soon as morning dawned I crept from <lb n="c57-0010__main__3"/> my assylum <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1542__Start"/>to<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1542__End"/> that I might view the <lb n="c57-0010__main__4"/> adjacent cottage and discover if I could <lb n="c57-0010__main__5"/> remain in the kennel that I had found. <lb n="c57-0010__main__6"/> It was situated <mdel>at</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>against the back of the cottage <lb n="c57-0010__main__7"/> and <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>surrounded on <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1579__Start"/>its<del n="c57-0010__main__8"/> by a pigstye & –c<mdel>r</mdel>lear pool of water one <lb n="c57-0010__main__9"/> part was open and by that I had crept <lb n="c57-0010__main__10"/> in but now <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1615__Start"/>with stones and wood<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1615__End"/> I cover <lb n="c57-0010__main__11"/> ed every crevice with stones & wood by which I might be <lb n="c57-0010__main__12"/> discovered <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0010.01">^</metamark> yet in such a manner <lb n="c57-0010__main__13"/> that I could move the<mdel>n</mdel>m on an occasion <lb n="c57-0010__main__14"/> to pass out; all the light I enjoyed came <lb n="c57-0010__main__15"/> through the stye and that was suffi <lb n="c57-0010__main__16"/> cient for me.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0010__main__17"/> Having thus arranged my dwelling &<lb n="c57-0010__main__18"/><del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1653__Start"/>spr<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1653__End"/> carpeted it with clean straw, I retired <lb n="c57-0010__main__19"/> for I saw the figure of a man <mdel>in</mdel>at a distance <lb n="c57-0010__main__20"/> and <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1671__Start"/>feared<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1671__End"/> I <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1674__Start"/>feared<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1674__End"/> remembered <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1677__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1677__End"/><lb n="c57-0010__main__21"/> too well my treatment the night <lb n="c57-0010__main__22"/> before <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1684__Start"/>not<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1684__End"/> to trust myself in his <lb n="c57-0010__main__23"/> power. I had first however provided <lb n="c57-0010__main__24"/> for my sustenance for that day <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1692__Start"/>by mean<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1692__End"/><lb n="c57-0010__main__25"/> by a loaf of <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1697__Start"/>bro<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1697__End"/> coarse bread which I pur <lb n="c57-0010__main__26"/> loined and a cup <mdel>w</mdel><mdel>by</mdel>with which I could <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1715__Start"/>take<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1715__End"/><lb n="c57-0010__main__27"/> drin<mdel>g</mdel>k more conveniently than from my<lb n="c57-0011__main__1"/> hand <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1739__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1739__End"/>ofthe pure water which flowed by my <lb n="c57-0011__main__2"/><del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1755__Start"/>house<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1755__End"/>retreat – <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1762__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1762__End"/><mdel>t</mdel>The f<mdel></mdel>loor <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1784__Start"/>of that<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1784__End"/><del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1787__Start"/>being<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1787__End"/><lb n="c57-0011__main__3"/><lb n="c57-0011__left_margin__1"/>was a little raised <mdel>&</mdel><mdel>it</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>so that it was kept <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>perfectly dry and by <lb n="c57-0011__main__4"/> its vicinity to the chimney of the <lb n="c57-0011__main__5"/> kitchen fire of the cottage it was <lb n="c57-0011__main__6"/> tolerably warm. <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1832__Start"/>And<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1832__End"/><mdel>b</mdel>Being thus provided <lb n="c57-0011__main__7"/> I determined to reside in this hovel <lb n="c57-0011__main__8"/> untill <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1849__Start"/>o<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1849__End"/> something should occur which <lb n="c57-0011__main__9"/> might alter my determination. It <lb n="c57-0011__main__10"/> was indeed a paradise compared to <lb n="c57-0011__main__11"/> the blea<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1859__Start"/>c<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1859__End"/>k forest, my former residence, <lb n="c57-0011__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1863__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1863__End"/> the<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1866__Start"/>ir<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1866__End"/> rain dropping <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1871__Start"/>leaves<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1871__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>branches <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>& the dank earth. I ate <lb n="c57-0011__main__13"/> my breakfast with pleasure and was <lb n="c57-0011__main__14"/> about to remove a plank to procure <lb n="c57-0011__main__15"/> myself a little water when I heard <lb n="c57-0011__main__16"/> a step and looking through a small <lb n="c57-0011__main__17"/> chink a beheld a young creature <lb n="c57-0011__main__18"/> with a pail on her head passing <lb n="c57-0011__main__19"/> before my hovel. The girl was youn<mdel><mdel>d</mdel></mdel>g<lb n="c57-0011__main__20"/> and of gentle demænour unlike what <lb n="c57-0011__main__21"/> I have since found Cottagers and farm <lb n="c57-0011__main__22"/> house servants to be – Yet she was mean <lb n="c57-0011__main__23"/> ly dressed – a <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1924__Start"/>blue<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1924__End"/> coarse <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>blue petticoat and a <lb n="c57-0011__main__24"/><lb n="c57-0011__left_margin__1"/>linen jacket being her only garb <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1945__Start"/>on<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1945__End"/> her fair hair <lb n="c57-0011__main__25"/> was plaited but not adorned; she looked patient <lb n="c57-0011__main__26"/> yet sad. She passed <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1953__Start"/>aw<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1953__End"/> away but in a quarter <lb n="c57-0011__main__27"/> of an hour returned, <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1958__Start"/>be<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1958__End"/> bearing the pail which <lb n="c57-0011__main__28"/> was now partly filled with milk. As she walked <lb n="c57-0011__main__29"/> along seemingly incommoded by the burthen<lb n="c57-0012__main__1"/> a young man met her whose countenance <lb n="c57-0012__main__2"/> expressed a deeper desponc<mdel></mdel>ens<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1985__Start"/>des<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1985__End"/>cesly; <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1992__Start"/>than her<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1992__End"/><lb n="c57-0012__main__3"/> uttering a few <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2000__Start"/>words<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2000__End"/>sounds with <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2007__Start"/>ain<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2007__End"/> an air of <lb n="c57-0012__main__4"/> melancholy he took the pail from her head <lb n="c57-0012__main__5"/> and bore it into the cottage himself. She <lb n="c57-0012__main__6"/> followed <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2017__Start"/>wiping<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2017__End"/><del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2020__Start"/>dry my her tears whi<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2020__End"/>, and they <lb n="c57-0012__main__7"/> diasppeared – Presently I saw the young man <lb n="c57-0012__main__8"/> again with some tools in his hand cross the <lb n="c57-0012__main__9"/> field opposite the cottage and the girl was <lb n="c57-0012__main__10"/> also busied someti<mdel>n</mdel>mes in <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2041__Start"/>and som<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2041__End"/> the cottage <lb n="c57-0012__main__11"/> and sometimes in the yard where she fe<mdel>t</mdel>d<lb n="c57-0012__main__12"/> some <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2057__Start"/>ck<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2057__End"/> chickens. <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2061__Start"/>and after some hours <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2061__End"/>While <lb n="c57-0012__main__13"/> I examined my dwelling I discovered that part <lb n="c57-0012__main__14"/> of the cottage window had formerly occupied <lb n="c57-0012__main__15"/> a corner of it <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2070__Start"/>pu<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2070__End"/> but the panes had <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2073__Start"/>n<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2073__End"/> been <lb n="c57-0012__main__16"/> filled up with wood. In one of these was <lb n="c57-0012__main__17"/> a small & allmost imperceptible <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2081__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2081__End"/> chink, <lb n="c57-0012__main__18"/> through which <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2086__Start"/>howev<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2086__End"/> the eye could just <lb n="c57-0012__main__19"/> pene<mdel>a</mdel>trate; <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2103__Start"/>and looking in<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2103__End"/><del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2106__Start"/>I behe<del atti <lb n="c57-0012__main__24"/> tude — <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0012.01">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0012__left_margin__1"/> his hair <lb n="c57-0012__left_margin__2"/> was grey The loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2208__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2208__End"/> a drawer <lb n="c57-0012__main__27"/> which employed her hands <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2216__Start"/>and<del n="c57-0012__main__28"/> man who taking up an <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2234__Start"/>instur<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2234__End"/> instrument began <lb n="c57-0012__main__29"/> to play and to produce sounds sweeter than <lb n="c57-0012__main__30"/> the voice of the thrush or nightingale. <note> This chapter is too short </note><lb n="c57-0013__main__1"/> It was a lovely sight even to me poor <lb n="c57-0013__main__2"/><del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2252__Start"/>whec<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2252__End"/> wretch who had never beheld aught <lb n="c57-0013__main__3"/> beautiful before. <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2259__Start"/>his<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2259__End"/>the silver hairs &<lb n="c57-0013__main__4"/> benevolent countenance <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2277__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2277__End"/><del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2280__Start"/>more<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2280__End"/> aged <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2283__Start"/>inhabit<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2283__End"/> cottager won my reverence <lb n="c57-0013__main__5"/> while <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the gentle manners of the girl enticed <lb n="c57-0013__main__6"/> my love. He played a sweet mournful <lb n="c57-0013__main__7"/> air which I percieved drew tears from <lb n="c57-0013__main__8"/> the eyes of <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2309__Start"/>the gen amiable gir<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2309__End"/><mdel>l</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>his <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2321__Start"/>you<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2321__End"/> amiable companion<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2326__Start"/>till her<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2326__End"/><lb n="c57-0013__main__9"/><lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__1"/>of which the old man took <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>no notice <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2347__Start"/>of<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2347__End"/> it untill <lb n="c57-0013__main__10"/> she sobbed audibly – He <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2353__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2353__End"/> then pronounced <lb n="c57-0013__main__11"/> a few sounds and the poor creature leaving <lb n="c57-0013__main__12"/> her work knelt at his feet he rasied her <lb n="c57-0013__main__13"/> and smiled with such <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2362__Start"/>grace<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2362__End"/> kindness &<lb n="c57-0013__main__14"/> love that I felt <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2368__Start"/>my own hard nerves<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2368__End"/>sensations of a peculiar & overpowering<lb n="c57-0013__main__15"/><del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2375__Start"/>move and I was obliged to withdraw from<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2375__End"/><lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__1"/>nature they were a<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2391__Start"/>nature<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2391__End"/>mixtureof pain & pleasure; such <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2401__Start"/>as<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2401__End"/> as I had never experienced<lb n="c57-0013__main__16"/><del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2406__Start"/>my the hole. Presently the young ma<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2406__End"/>either from<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2412__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2412__End"/>hunger or cold, <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2418__Start"/>orfrom<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2418__End"/>or warmth or food and I<lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c57-0013__left_margin__d1e2431__Start"/>withdrew<del loc="c57-0013__left_margin__d1e2431__End"/>from my stationwithdrew<lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__2"/>unable to<lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__3"/>bear<del loc="c57-0013__left_margin__d1e2452__Start"/>these new<del loc="c57-0013__left_margin__d1e2452__End"/>these<lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__4"/><del loc="c57-0013__left_margin__d1e2462__Start"/>emotio<del loc="c57-0013__left_margin__d1e2462__End"/><mdel>ns</mdel>emotions<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0013__main__17"/> Soon after this the young man returned <lb n="c57-0013__main__18"/> bearing on his sholders a <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2482__Start"/>load<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2482__End"/> load of wood <lb n="c57-0013__main__19"/> the<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2487__Start"/>r<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2487__End"/> girl met him at the door<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2490__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2490__End"/> helped <lb n="c57-0013__main__20"/> to relieve him of his burden and <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2496__Start"/>took<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2496__End"/><lb n="c57-0013__main__21"/> taking some of it into the <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2501__Start"/>fire<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2501__End"/> cottage <lb n="c57-0013__main__22"/> placed it on the fire; <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2506__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2506__End"/> then she and the <lb n="c57-0013__main__23"/> youth went apart into a <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2515__Start"/>nok<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2515__End"/>nook of the cottage <lb n="c57-0013__main__24"/> and he shewed her a large loaf and a piece <lb n="c57-0013__main__25"/> of cheese.—She seemed pleased and went <lb n="c57-0013__main__26"/> into the garden for soome roots & plants <lb n="c57-0013__main__27"/> which she placed in water and then upon <lb n="c57-0013__main__28"/> the fire–. She <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2538__Start"/>then<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2538__End"/>afterwards continued her work <mdel>&</mdel><lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__1"/>whilst<lb n="c57-0013__main__29"/> the young man went into the <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2560__Start"/>pa<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2560__End"/> garden <lb n="c57-0013__main__30"/> and appeared busily employed in digging & pul<lb n="c57-0014__main__1"/> pulling up roots– –After he had been employed <lb n="c57-0014__main__2"/> thus about <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2575__Start"/>hal<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2575__End"/> an hour the young woman <lb n="c57-0014__main__3"/> joined him, & they returned to the cottage <lb n="c57-0014__main__4"/> together – The old man in the mean time <lb n="c57-0014__main__5"/> had been pe<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>nsive but on the approach <lb n="c57-0014__main__6"/> of <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2599__Start"/>the others<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2599__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>his companions he assumed a <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2612__Start"/>pen<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2612__End"/>more cheerful <lb n="c57-0014__main__7"/> air, and they sat down to eat. They quickly <lb n="c57-0014__main__8"/> finished the<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2628__Start"/>ir<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2628__End"/> meal <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>was quickly dispatched; the young woman was <lb n="c57-0014__main__9"/> again occupied in arranging the cottage the <lb n="c57-0014__main__10"/> old man walked before the door in the <lb n="c57-0014__main__11"/> sun for a few minutes, leaning on the arm of the you<mdel>ng</mdel>th<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2660__Start"/>man<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2660__End"/><lb n="c57-0014__main__12"/> Nothing could exceed in beauty the contrast <lb n="c57-0014__main__13"/> between these two <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2668__Start"/>love<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2668__End"/><del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2671__Start"/>excl<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2671__End"/> excellent <lb n="c57-0014__main__14"/> creatures One was old, with silver hairs <lb n="c57-0014__main__15"/> and a countenance beaming with bene <lb n="c57-0014__main__16"/> volence & love; the younger was sli<mdel>m</mdel>ght<lb n="c57-0014__main__17"/> and graceful in his <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2692__Start"/>fu<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2692__End"/> figure and <lb n="c57-0014__main__18"/> his feautures were moulded with the <lb n="c57-0014__main__19"/> finest <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2701__Start"/>simetry<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2701__End"/>symmetry – yet his eyes & attitude <lb n="c57-0014__main__20"/> expressed the utmost sadness and despon <lb n="c57-0014__main__21"/> dencency— The old man returned to the <lb n="c57-0014__main__22"/> cottage; and the youth with tools different <lb n="c57-0014__main__23"/> from those which he had used in the morning, <lb n="c57-0014__main__24"/> directed his steps across the fields– Night <lb n="c57-0014__main__25"/> quickly shut in but to my extreme won <lb n="c57-0014__main__26"/> der I found that the cottagers had a <lb n="c57-0014__main__27"/> means of prolonging light by the use of tapers <lb n="c57-0014__main__28"/> and was pleased to find that <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2731__Start"/>end<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2731__End"/> setting <lb n="c57-0014__main__29"/> of the sun did not put an end <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2737__Start"/>I had<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2737__End"/> to <lb n="c57-0014__main__30"/> the pleasure I experienced in watching <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2742__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2742__End"/><lb n="c57-0015__main__1"/> my human neighbours.–In the evening <lb n="c57-0015__main__2"/> the young girl and her companion <lb n="c57-0015__main__3"/> were employed in various occupations; <lb n="c57-0015__main__4"/><del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2761__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2761__End"/>which I did not then understand, & the <lb n="c57-0015__main__5"/> old man again took that instru <lb n="c57-0015__main__6"/> ment which produced th<mdel>o</mdel>e<mdel>se</mdel> divine <lb n="c57-0015__main__7"/> sounds that had enchanted me in <lb n="c57-0015__main__8"/> the morning. <del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2791__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2791__End"/><del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2794__Start"/><mdel>w</mdel>When<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2794__End"/>So soon as he had finish <lb n="c57-0015__main__9"/> -ed the youth began,– not to play,– but <lb n="c57-0015__main__10"/><mdel>he</mdel>to utter<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2821__Start"/>ed<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2821__End"/> sounds which were monoto <lb n="c57-0015__main__11"/> nous <del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2827__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2827__End"/> and <del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2832__Start"/>far from<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2832__End"/>neither resembling the harmony <lb n="c57-0015__main__12"/> of the old mans instrument or the <lb n="c57-0015__main__13"/> songs of the birds I since found that <lb n="c57-0015__main__14"/> he read aloud, but at that time I knew nothing of the <lb n="c57-0015__main__15"/> science of words or letters. a<mdel></mdel>t that <lb n="c57-0015__main__16"/> time<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2871__Start"/>.<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2871__End"/> The family soon extinguished <lb n="c57-0015__main__17"/> their lights and retired, as I conjectured, <lb n="c57-0015__main__18"/> to <del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2878__Start"/>sleep<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2878__End"/>. rest
